details:
Monitorix Project reports:

> A serious bug in the built-in HTTP server. It was discovered that the
> handle\_request() routine did not properly perform input sanitization
> which led into a number of security vulnerabilities. An unauthenticated,
> remote attacker could exploit this flaw to execute arbitrary commands on
> the remote host. All users still using older versions are advised to
> upgrade to this version, which resolves this issue.
summary: monitorix -- serious bug in the built-in HTTP server
